h4.span:
Buckholts ISD is Great Again!
TEA "A" Rating

br.span: Offering the highest education with the smallest student to teacher ratio!

br.strong:
Now accepting student transfers!!
203 South 10th Street, Buckholts, Texas
254-593-2744 or 254-593-3011

span.br: We value your opinion! Please take a few moments to fill out our Parent/Student Survey!

span.br:
Saturday, June 15th, 2019
First 6 on 6 Passing Tournament Champions

p.style: margin: 0px 0px 10px; text-align: center; font-family: arial, sans-serif;

strong.style: font-family: Tahoma, Verdana, Arial, Helvetica; font-size: 10pt;

p.span:
Breakfast in the classroom for grades Pre- K - 4, grades 5 - 12 in cafeteria 7:30 am to 7:55 am
{Your child must arrive by 7:45 am to receive breakfast.}

p.style: margin: 0px 0px 10px; text-align: center; font-family: arial, sans-serif; font-size: 12px;

div.p:
Nondiscrimination Notice
BUCKHOLTS ISD does not discriminate on the basis of race, color, national origin, sex, or disability in providing education services, activities, and programs, including vocational programs, in accordance with Title VI of the Civil Rights Act of 1964, as amended; Title IX of the Educational Amendments of 1972; and section 504 of the rehabilitation Act of 1973; as amended.
